name: DownloadArtifacrs
description: Downloads the artifacts from a GitHub workflow run
author: Seva Alekseyev
instanceNameFormat: Get the artifacts from $(workflow) on github.com/$(repo)

inputs.name: gh
inputs.label: GitHub service connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: A GitHub type service connection to use. The token must have the rights to read actions. Github Enterprise is not supported.

inputs.name: repo
inputs.label: Owner/Repository
inputs.helpMarkDown:
The owner name and the repo name, slash separated.
If your repo is at https://github.com/acme/widgets/, then this parameter should be "acme/widgets".

inputs.name: workflow
inputs.label: Workflow name
inputs.helpMarkdown:
Name of the workflow to get the artifacts from, case insensitive. If blank, the first workflow in the repo will be chosen.
This parameter should match the contents of the `name:` line in your workflow's YAML file on GitHub.
